lender.name: Mauricio & Steph

lender.name: Josi

lender.name: Michele

lender.name: Daniel

lender.name: Colleen

lender.name: Design To Market LLC
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur with my own business in Cincinnati. I know that it is challenging to run a business in a country that has the infrastructure to make this possible. I want to help entrepreneurs in other countries where capital is often not available to small business owners able to realize their dreams of owning and running successul businesses.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Because I'm grateful for those who helped me when I needed it.
lender.occupational_info: We build houses

lender.name: Vince
lender.loan_because: I believe in Microfinance!

lender.name: G and M
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes me feel connected to the world, gives me the gift of feeling abundant, and allows me to see who and how I am helping.
lender.occupational_info: We work from home growing organic salad greens and alfalfa and clover sprouts. We deliver fresh produce in our truck to local restaurants and stores once a week.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows me to lend directly to people in need, in less developed countries.
lender.occupational_info: We offer the filipinocard.com site to allow family and friends to send money to each other for FREE worldwide. Its a good way to manage money for donations and expenses seperate from my regular checking account. Sign up today.

lender.name: Ronda
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that a little becomes, and does, a lot in conjunction with others

lender.name: Darcy
lender.loan_because: I had heard about this type of program probably about 2 years ago, but somehow I didn't understand that they were loans from individuals. I am so happy that I am able to participate even within a limited budget.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me so much that I would like to help others as well.

lender.occupational_info:
We would like to Inform the following Message to one and all below,
Kindly Note
Please ask your Clients and Customers in your Country of India and also in other Overseas Countries for the Business and International Trades for all the Commodities in terms of Exports or Imports of any Commodities to India or else where in the World, Business Confirmations, Trade Negotiations, Business Tie ups, Buy Backs, Machinery, Mergers, Banking in India and Overseas Countries, Offices and Trade Representations at Overseas Countries, Turn Key Projects, Project Consultations, Project Finance, Payments, Letter of Credits( L.C's), Acquisition's, Barter Trades, Bi Lateral Trades, Credits and still more to go on Lines and Prints etc,
Please get in touch with our Company in India for all of your needs and requirements linking many Countries in the World with your Company or with any of your regular Clients and Customers regarding various Business, Promotions and International Trades.
We now seek your high handed support, cooperation and regular follow up in this said matter and we expect you to give us some priority and preferences in these Issues.
We do help you in all the above mentioned situations and then we could work together and then to proceed further.
This is for your Kind Attention, Consideration and Information from our side and Company in India.
With Warm and Kindest Regards
Thanking You.
Sincerely Yours For Asians Pacific Corporation, India
RAVI KRISSHNAMURTHY Promoter
Please ask your Clients and Customers in your Country of India and then to write and address their Communications to us directly and let them send all of their Company Documents and Informations in our Company's Favor in India and to our Business Address as stated below,
RAVI KRISSHNAMURTHY C E O / Director ASIANS PACIFIC CORPORATION
Communications / Business Address: Capricorn, Fern Land, North End, Villa No: A- 6, No: 103, Erikarai Street, Ground Floor, Behind Ramappa Nagar, Near Life Line Hospitals, Perungudi, Chennai. Post Code 600 096. Tamil Nadu State.South India. India
Telephone Number:0091 44 4280 33 93
Fax Number : 0091 44 4280 33 93
Mobile Number : 0091 98841 39844 / 0091 98410 85899
E Mail Address : asianspacificcorporation@gmail.com Online Messenger's: krisshnamurthy@gmail.com - Messenger / apchotline@gmail.com - Messenger / ravikrisshnamurthy@yahoo.com - Messenger / apcindia@hotmail.com - Messenger / apcindia@rediffmail.com -Messenger

lender.name: imran

lender.name: Aiyana
lender.loan_because: I am a very blessed individual. My parents have always provided for me, and they continue to do so, even during tough times. lender.occupational_info: I am homeschooled, and have been since Kindergarten. I just turned 15, and for my birthday, I asked all of my guests for donations for Kiva, in place of gifts.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: it's a simple way to give real help and changing someone's life. Kiva can help solving the source problems of poverty and calamity.

lender.name: Toronto Family
lender.loan_because:
Galatians 6:10 says,
Therefore, as we have opportunity, let us do good to all, especially to those who are of the household of faith.
I have spent a fair bit of time in third world countries and have seen the face of poverty again and again. I thank God for the opportunity to do a small bit to lend a hand to those in need. The Lord has blessed my family and I, and we in turn want to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info:
Preaching and teaching the good news of Jesus Christ in the Greater Toronto Area, and wherever I have the opportunity, the world over.
What a great life and what a great blessing to serve God!

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are trying to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Simply put. I sit in front of a computer all day and fix server and other computer problems.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I love people.

lender.name: Marla

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves

lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

I enjoy helping people.
The cultivation of the earth ought ever to be esteemed as the most useful and necessary employment in life. The food and raiment by which all other orders of men are supported are derived from the earth. Agriculture is of consequence: the art which supports, supplies, and maintains all the rest. Robert B. Thomas, 1796
lender.occupational_info: I fix things, but, I can not fix a broken heart. :'-(

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I want to know I've attempted to help my fellow human.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Auto repair

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: to help the world by helping people
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers in a big hospital for the poor

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to help people help themselves better their lives through hard work.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to reduce inequality. People have very different opportunities and I've had a fortunate life that allows me to donate/lend money to others.
lender.occupational_info: I build computer programs that have conversations with people.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: My first KIVA loan was a gift from a friend and I love that it's a gift that keeps on giving!

lender.name: Marisa
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of someone less fortunate than myself!

lender.loan_because: I want to see other people succeed. Je parle le francais aussi.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I want to support business development for people who have no means to find loans from big banks.

lender.name: Ray and Robin
lender.loan_because: We would rather teach a man to fish than give a man a fish.

lender.loan_because: What goes around, comes around!

lender.name: thorsten&steffi

lender.occupational_info: I have a office in china and there we produce denim trousers and import this to germany and sell it to big textil shop`s in europe

lender.name: Peggy, Tiggin, & Isis
lender.loan_because: We're all in this TOGETHER!
lender.occupational_info: I use the power of words to collect information, tell stories, better understand how the world works, and communicate what I've learned to others.

lender.name: Mihai and Melissa
lender.loan_because: Americans have a greater responsibility to the rest of the world since God has blessed us so abundantly! We give because Jesus Christ loves us and wants us to love others.
lender.occupational_info: My husband teaches Physical Education. I use sound waves to create images of people's organs and tissues inside their bodies that doctors look at to know if something is wrong with the people.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I can't loan right now, because every day is a struggle to get by (just to afford rent and food), but I know the day will come when I graduate, and I'm better off, and I want to help people who can't get out of poverty by themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I and my husband are full-time college students, with a 3 year old and a child on the way, studying political science.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand now and then. This is one way I can help others not in my immediate community.
lender.occupational_info: I organize and manage people to deliver products, technologies and anything else the company requires to satisfy customer needs. I make it happen.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's the Wright thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I no longer work at a day job, so I grow food in my back yard and cook it for me, my wife, our family and friends.

lender.name: Mason
lender.loan_because: To help them out trouble. Life without Limits.

lender.name: Iris
lender.loan_because: I would rather be there personally helping but my money can go places I can't.
lender.occupational_info: I am learning about natural medicine to provide better health care.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company helping to develop new medicines

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: I think this can help people

lender.name: Eve
lender.loan_because: Not everyone has the amazing advantages that I have had. This is my small way of trying to make up for that.

lender.name: Davide
lender.loan_because: Traditional charity, while crucial, does not fundamentally relieve the ongoing need for people everywhere to be able to support themselves and their families. I believe Kiva provides a source of life-changing funding to people who are poised to improve not only their own lives, but those of their families and communities. How do we not all profit from that?
lender.occupational_info: I write medical education materials by day and bake to make the world a tastier place by night

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I grew up in a poor, large family. This is a way I can give back because I appreciated all the help others gave my family.
lender.occupational_info: I give treatments to physical therapy patients under the guidance of a physical therapist. I also set up exercise programs for people that want to improve their fitness.

lender.name: Paris Family
lender.occupational_info: My company, ruubi, creates online reverse bid auction site to help non-profits and schools raise money while at the same time supporting the local merchants involved in the auctions.

lender.name: Renewed Materials, LLC
lender.loan_because:
Our main objective in everything that we do is to make a positive contribution to the world.
Renewed Materials, LLC is proud to work with Kiva.org to support entrepreneurs and small businesses in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: We design, develop and market environmentally beneficial building materials. Our flagship product, ALKEMI, is a recycled surfacing made from post-industrial aluminum scrap, solid surface and acrylic waste.

lender.name: Maarten
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principle of microcredit and helping people to help themselves

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to give everyone the chance at a better life, a chance at success and a sense of pride. We are just so lucky and we take that for granted everyday.
lender.occupational_info: I find people to lend money to help make people's dreams come true

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help put out fires and provide medical care to those in need.

lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of people who ask others for money to go to a great housing / homeless charity, SHELTER

lender.name: Jess Sandhu
lender.loan_because: like all other Kiva members i wish to see improvements in living standards of the poor in the third world
lender.occupational_info: Engineering and Construction

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I places orders for people who want to buy or sell stock in public companies.

lender.name: Ruben Ricart
lender.loan_because: I believe in helpign out - at the end of the day its about Karma - God sees us doing some good and in turn he will grant us great things.

lender.name: Isaac K-W
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I love this model of development: minimally invasive, and far more useful than a simple charity. I also waste a lot of money shopping online, so I loan to offset my consumer's guilt.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small radio station with big goals. I am a news reporter and a DJ, and I also have a weekly local foods cooking show.

lender.name: kris
lender.loan_because: "The true meaning of life is to plant trees under whose shade you do not intend to sit." --N. Henderson

lender.name: Jennica
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard-working people in the world achieve a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people keep their teeth and gums healthy.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: It's so fun to see the effects you can make thousands of miles away!

lender.name: Jason and Danby
lender.loan_because: Because we all benefit from a stronger global community.
lender.occupational_info: Jason works as a bank teller -- processing transactions and I work in asset management -- which helps people invest their money and safeguard their financial futures.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: I loved the concept.

lender.name: Teddy
lender.loan_because: World peace can only be achieved by international business commerce. Once the rest of the world catches up with my culture, and we grow together and we rely on foreign goods, we will never go to war with them. It would kill our economy. This website is the first step in obtaining world peace. For real!
lender.occupational_info: I build Websites.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my children the value of helping others.

lender.name: Emi
lender.loan_because: I think this is one of the Japanese spirit "Otagai-sama",that means we can depend on each other when we are in trouble.

lender.name: CUBEX
lender.loan_because: Cubex is a small professional web design company dedicated to providing its customers with exceptional website design solutions. Located in Amsterdam, we have worked with businesses and individuals across the world on both large and small projects for a number of years. Our professional team at Cubex is geared at working with its customers to create new websites and other professional website design solutions. Here at Cubex, we have the passion for designing minimal, elegant and clean websites for customers.

lender.name: Jenna S.
lender.occupation: Currently in transition as a result of downsizing
lender.loan_because: I believe if you are able to help, you should. This is one small way to make the world a better place.

lender.name: adline
lender.loan_because: This is such a wonderful idea and connects people from such different parts of the world with a really important goal - encouraging independence.
lender.occupational_info: I work to support people with cancer and their families; helping them get through the psychological and emotional challenges that this illness brings. It is an incredibly rewarding job.

lender.name: Lydia and Tuan
lender.loan_because: We want to give people a chance to improve their lives

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I consider myself to have always been blessed with having the necessities of life, and like to help others
lender.occupational_info: I do volunteer work by visiting shut ins, and I am on the board of directors of an animal rescue charity.

lender.name: Billings West
lender.loan_because: We realize that the basic human rights of food and shelter come with the right to have an income.
lender.occupational_info: We work for human right throughout the world by writing letters, educating our peers, and doing things such as kiva.

lender.name: Hong
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I develop cardiac assist device.

lender.name: 2 Human Beans
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better themselves and, in turn, help others.
lender.occupational_info: Mother: raising a family Educator: teaching at a local community college

lender.name: Debbie & Jake
lender.loan_because: We want to be among those who make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Ari
lender.loan_because: I love seeing a positive difference not just domestically but internationally as well.....it gives you a better perspective of what we take for granted.
lender.occupational_info: Ummm well let's see. a little bit about what I do concerns:.....books, books and well more books, listening to lectures....and late night studying for tests.....does that do it?

lender.name: Teresa Rena
lender.loan_because: I believe improving the global economy begins with people helping people. Organizations like Kiva and their partners help foster sustainable economic growth. I also like being able to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I do relatively unimportant office work for a financial management company.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is a way I can help people improve their lives. This gesture is made with love and gratuity for all that I have been given in my own life.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I grew up poor.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I heard the story of KIVA on NPR and was so impressed with the ability of micro lenders to impact entrepreneurs from around the world. I hope a little of my money will go a long ways to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I play musical instruments for a living, in a variety of contexts.

lender.name: pauline
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by my sister-in-law to set a good example for our children and I realize that a small contribution can make a big difference to someone else's life
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organisation that supports young people living with cancer whether they have it themselves or a parent or brother or sister has cancer. I write resources o support them in their cancer journey

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: "How lovely to think that no one need wait a moment: we can start now, start slowly changing the world! How lovely that everyone, great and small, can make a contribution toward introducing justice straight away." --Anne Frank

lender.name: gwendolen
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed. You can only keep that which you give away - love, trust, honor, and kindness.
lender.occupational_info: I help people design, fix, and improve computer networks that span continents.

lender.name: Timo
lender.loan_because: My uncle Olli introduced me to it.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: it matters.

lender.name: Sepehr
lender.loan_because: We are sharing the same world!

lender.name: Marilee
lender.loan_because: It is only fair to share resources. Everyone deserves a chance to create a meaningful and productive life.
lender.occupational_info: University education professor

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: I'm giving it back..... or paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: My occupation is a lot like doing nothing.

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good way of helping people improving their lives though their own work! - Credo che sia un buon metodo per aiutare le persone tramite il loro stesso lavoro!

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: It helps a hard worker and entrepreneur get their business off the ground.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Health Service in Employee Relations

lender.name: Becky Byford
lender.loan_because: I see and feel the need for change. To feel part of something bigger that can make a difference in the world, that we sometimes have no contol over.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer. An author of romantic fiction. I write from my heart and soul.

lender.name: Berry Family
lender.loan_because: We live in a free country with plentiful resources, running water, electricity and roads, we are very fortunate and wish that all people had the same opportunities for a better life
lender.occupational_info: I'm (Shane) a Newtork Engineer, troubleshoot and Fix IT Systems. Janice does bookeeping and accounting, Emma and Jack go to the local school...

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, and helping people in developing countries helps everyone
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to use computers to run their businesses

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I want to see people have a fair chance to change their hopes and aspirations into a reality.

lender.name: Class of 70
lender.loan_because: we hope we can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: a group of friends who, in the dim and distant past, all attended St Georges School, Harpenden

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because:
The Bible teaches...
"...that those who have believed in God should be careful to maintain good works. These things are good and profitable to men." - Titus 3:8
lender.occupational_info: Preaching and teaching the good news of Jesus Christ in the Central Florida (USA) area, and wherever I have the opportunity, the world over.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because:
Its the right thing to do. I already have everything I need. My friends want to know what to get me for my birthday, I say "heres this charity"
:)
lender.occupational_info: I am a 16 year old student in my Junior year of high school. I will be going to college in less then two years.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: To help people around the world get on their feet and find self reliance

lender.name: MARK & DIANE
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Family owned/operated tent & party rental business.

lender.name: Dirk
lender.loan_because: I loan some of the money I formerly gave to church every month. I wanted the money to be a real help to someone who needs it (as opposed to keep up a rigid belief system).
lender.occupational_info: I am an academic studying the field of development economics. I try to figure out more efficient ways to improve the economic situation in developing countries. My focus is on trade and the environment.

lender.name: Hanan
lender.loan_because: We live to love

lender.name: Beth and Joshua
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance.

lender.name: Sujaan
lender.loan_because: I believe we need to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I have a holistic health care practice. I am trained in acupuncture, herbal medicine, massage and yoga.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all one family in this world.
lender.occupational_info: Je traduis du franais en anglais pour le Parlement du Canada. I am a French-English translator and I work for Canada's Parliament.

lender.name: robocombot
lender.loan_because: why not?
lender.occupational_info: design buildings, sometimes they get built!

lender.name: Abiol
lender.loan_because: I am a part of this world and I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Assistant in Mergers and Acquisitions

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: "If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world." Thorin, The Hobbit, J.R.R Tolkien

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Two friends of mine generously asked that donations be made to Kiva in lieu of gifts for their wedding. I had heard of microloan organizations previously, but their gesture got me started at Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician (Neurologist) and scientist--I care for people with debilitating or fatal nerve and muscle disorders in the Clinic, and I search for causes and cures in the Laboratory.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I feel everyone in the world needs a chance.....
lender.occupational_info: Crazy and stressfull

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: Full-time student: I'm taking classes with hopes of being a doctor someday.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: We are all ONE and I want to help those less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I work with my hands in the earth, or holding a tool, tending plants in people's yards. I do everything organically and consider all of the Earth's creatures in my every action, including the Earth itself.

lender.name: Kassi
lender.loan_because: I love being part of people helping people.
lender.occupational_info: Working with electronics and software to make things work.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.occupation: MA Sustainable Development grad, USPS letter carri
lender.loan_because: Reducing poverty and improving the quality of life for poor people greatly adds to my spiritual wealth and ultimately makes the world a better place for all of us.
lender.occupational_info: My day job is to deliver letters and packages to people at their homes. This gives me the time and means to be able to help others and to pursue my passion for microfinance and economic development.

lender.name: Emma and Snail
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: A lot of playing at the park. We like monkey bars and swings.

lender.name: Hilda
lender.loan_because: it's an honour to have the opportunity to support other small entrepreneurs and watch their businisess grow. It's the joy of sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I write text and stories. For business and pleasure. (In dutch)

lender.name: absolutearts
lender.loan_because: We believe in supporting others through micro loans.
lender.occupational_info: We are an arts organization with over 27,000 visual artists showcasing their artwork to the world.

lender.name: Dona
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to take care of their teeth,examine and clean the teeth

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: Want to help make a difference

lender.name: fiona
